name: julianprice.com Ltd
goal: Consultancy services in the sugar sector: Advice concerning markets, trade flows, prices, speciality products, EU and national regulations, ACP trade agreements, Brexit, WTO and other activities in the global sugar sector.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
= Interaction as an invited expert with DG AGRI European Commission concerning the EU and global sugar markets; presentations on the Outlook for the Agricultural Markets.
= Interaction as the ACP Commercial Representative of the Swaziland Sugar Association with DG AGRI, DG TRADE and DG DEVCO in meetings at ACP House and EU institutions, especially concerning the implementation of the trade aspects of the Economic Partnership Agreements with ACP countries and the Everything But Arms initiative for LDC countries.
